sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { USER_MAIN_DATA } from '../../data/mocked-data' import { Modelisation } from '../../data/Modelisation' import './style.scss' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' //IMPORT IMAGES import caloriesImg from '../../assets/calories-icon.png' import proteinesImg from '../../assets/protein-icon.png' import glucidesImg from '../../assets/carbs-icon.png' import lipidesImg from '../../assets/fat-icon.png' const calories = 'Calories' const proteines = 'Protéines' const glucides = 'Glucides' const lipides = 'Lipides' //separateur millier function numStr(a, b) { a = '' + a b = b || ',' let c = '', d = 0 while (a.match(/^0[0-9]/)) { a = a.substr(1) } for (let i = a.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) { c = d !== 0 && d % 3 === 0 ? a[i] + b + c : a[i] + c d++ } return c } const Energie = () => { const [data, setData] = useState(null) const paramsId = useParams() useEffect(() => { const modelisation = new Modelisation(USER_MAIN_DATA) setData(modelisation.formatDataEnergy(paramsId)) }, []) console.log(data) if (data !== null) { return (

{`${data.calorieCount.toLocaleString('en-IN')}kCal`}

{calories}

{`${data.proteinCount}g`}

{proteines}

{`${data.carbohydrateCount}g`}

{glucides}

{`${data.lipidCount}g`}

{lipides}

 ) } } export default Energie
